
## Apartat b) 

```{r}
x = c(58, 50, 60, 65, 64, 62, 56, 57)
upper = mean(x) + qt(0.95, length(x)-1)*sqrt(var(x))/sqrt(length(x))
lower = mean(x) - qt(0.95, length(x)-1)*sqrt(var(x))/sqrt(length(x))
```

## Apartat c)
